## Private Member Functions

### canonicalizeExitCondition() {#af09bf784f5241fea2b44266c2af1fa2d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::canonicalizeExitCondition (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}>
Try to improve our exit conditions by converting condition from signed to unsigned or rotating computation out of the loop.

(See inline comment about why this is duplicated from simplifyAndExtend)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### handleFloatingPointIV() {#ab06615ccd2b3228cbe146fcbf82432ab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::handleFloatingPointIV (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; PN)</>}>
If the loop has floating induction variable then insert corresponding integer induction variable if possible.

For example, for(double i = 0; i &lt; 10000; ++i) bar(i) is converted into for(int i = 0; i &lt; 10000; ++i) bar((double)i);

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### linearFunctionTestReplace() {#ae6f5ac6fa0ab8931a509ff2d8a4e5cf7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::linearFunctionTestReplace (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; ExitingBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; ExitCount, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; IndVar, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Rewriter)</>}>
This method rewrites the exit condition of the loop to be a canonical != comparison against the incremented loop induction variable.

This pass is able to rewrite the exit tests of any loop where the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> analysis can determine a loop-invariant trip count of the loop, which is actually a much broader range than just linear tests.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### optimizeLoopExits() {#a57e181df495e58fdbe3b2a15b84ff6bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::optimizeLoopExits (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Rewriter)</>}>
Try to eliminate loop exits based on analyzeable exit counts.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00149">149</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.

### predicateLoopExits() {#a0f9973747fb5bde602a5d65c41399880}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::predicateLoopExits (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Rewriter)</>}>
Try to form loop invariant tests for loop exits by changing how many iterations of the loop run when that is unobservable.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00152">152</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### rewriteFirstIterationLoopExitValues() {#a446fcee9ea59ca89e56f46e784b7857d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::rewriteFirstIterationLoopExitValues (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}>
Check to see if this loop has loop invariant conditions which lead to loop exits.

If so, we know that if the exit path is taken, it is at the first loop iteration. This lets us predict exit values of PHI nodes that live in loop header.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00154">154</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### rewriteNonIntegerIVs() {#a427d12366f7a0359e780c1dc0879aa26}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::rewriteNonIntegerIVs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### simplifyAndExtend() {#ac08a2408406bb9dfbdda5828ab4174c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::simplifyAndExtend (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Rewriter, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI)</>}>
Iteratively perform simplification on a worklist of IV users.

Each successive simplification may push more users which may themselves be candidates for simplification.

Sign/Zero extend elimination is interleaved with IV simplification.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### sinkUnusedInvariants() {#ac1d08f3a63ec668a65f2cbf7982177d6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndVarSimplify::sinkUnusedInvariants (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}>
If there&#39;s a single exit block, sink any loop-invariant values that were defined in the preheader but not used inside the loop into the exit block to reduce register pressure in the loop.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp">IndVarSimplify.cpp</a>.
